snippet: Though U.S. players refused to say that beating Ghana would be a huge accomplishment, the team simply would not allow a third straight World Cup loss to the Black Stars.
abstract: Juliet Macur Sports of The Times column; though soccer players on United States men's team refuse to say beating Ghana would be a huge accomplishment, team simply would not allow third straight World Cup loss to the Black Stars.
lead_paragraph: Though U.S. players refused to say that beating Ghana would be a huge accomplishment, the team simply would not allow a third straight World Cup loss to the Black Stars.

headline.seo: In World Cup Opener, United States Defense Rises to the Occasion
headline.main: Quiet About Adversary, U.S. Posts a Victory That Speaks Volumes
headline.print_headline: Quiet About Adversary, U.S. Posts a Victory That Speaks Volumes
